sentence.text: Let us assume that a cat stalks a duck until it gets within striking distance .
She was as tense as a cat stalking a bird .
I was soaked from lying in manky bog-like horrids , stalking some half-witted bird around lava lagoons , and John asked if I want tea .
The Trunchbull started advancing slow and soft-footed upon Rupert in the manner of a tigress stalking a small deer .
The rapist is thought to have stalked the girl to find out her routine .
He would be patient , stalk her carefully right up to the bedroom door .
While , behind her , on silent feet , a dark man with hooded eyes stalked her .
But Ranulf was here and while Corbett bathed and changed his clothing , he wondered how Ranulf could protect him from the secret assassins now stalking him .
Either group could stalk the adventurers during the journey to Castle Drachenfels .
Often we 'd stalk a herd for days on end , and all that time we 'd never even catch a glimpse .
Warriors still hunt the jaguar in ritualised fashion ; they must stalk it for three days and it may only be killed with a wooden spear .
I suspect that , if he imagines a dark grizzly bear trying to stalk seals over the snow , the Bishop will immediately see the answer to his problem .
You never knew these days when a casual remark was going to provide the justification for someone stalking you with an automatic rifle .
In the heart of the African rain forest a chameleon crouches on a branch , stalking an insect .
It crept stealthily towards him over the mud , advancing , retreating , advancing again like a living creature stalking its prey .
Since early September the 23-year-old multi-millionaire had been stalked by a mystery woman threatening to kill the man she once idolised .
They were stalked by gunman John Clarke at a fundraising event for Alder Hey Children 's Hospital at which Russell Grant appeared as the celebrity guest .
Or could she have been stalked and then attacked by some psychopathic killer ?
` Talking of poachers , what did you find out about the ones who were stalking Mills just before he was murdered ? "
